posts.post_content:
I've got some lower grade's I'd be willing to trade for other lower grades I don't have, especially in backs I need. Or would love to trade multiples for a HOF in low grade from my want list. 

HOF Wants:
Home Run Baker
Mordecai Brown
Rube Waddell
Joe Tinker
Johnny Evers
Frank Chance

Player Wants:
Kitty Bransfield
Jack Jacklitsch
Sherwood Magee (Batting)

Back Wants:
Polar Bear
Sweet Caporal 350 Factory No.25
Old Mill (Base Ball Subjects)
Sweet Caporal 150 Factory No.649 Overprint
Old Mill (Southern Leagues) - Black
American Beauty 350 (Frame)
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory No.25
Tolstoi
Cycle 460
